026    package com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.config.annotations;
027    
028    import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
029    import java.lang.annotation.Inherited;
030    import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
031    import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
032    import java.lang.annotation.Target;
033    
034    @Inherited
035    @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
036    @Target({ElementType.TYPE})
037    public @interface DirectAction {
038      String[] action() default "";
039    }
